{{Infobox company | name = ThyssenKrupp Marine Systems | logo = [[File:Thyssenkrupp AG Logo 2015.svg|175px|ThyssenKrupp Logo]] | type = [[Privately held company|Private]] | genre = | foundation = 2005 | founder = | location_city = [[Düsseldorf]] | location_country = [[Germany]] | location = | origins = | key_people = [[Hans-Christoph Atzpodien]], CEO | area_served = | industry = [[Shipbuilding]] | products = | services = | revenue = €2.2 billion | operating_income = | net_income = | num_employees = 8,400 | parent = [[ThyssenKrupp Technologies]] | divisions = | subsid = [[Howaldtswerke-Deutsche Werft]]
[[Nobiskrug]]
[[Blohm + Voss]]
[[Nordseewerke]]
[[Hellenic Shipyards Co.]] | owner = [[ThyssenKrupp]] | company_slogan = | homepage = [http://tk-marinesystems.de tk-marinesystems.de] | dissolved = | footnotes = }} '''ThyssenKrupp Marine Systems''' of [[Germany]] (often abbreviated '''TKMS''') is a group and holding company of providers of naval vessels, [[surface ship]]s and [[submarine]]s. It was founded when large industrial conglomerate [[ThyssenKrupp]] acquired [[Howaldtswerke-Deutsche Werft]] on January 5, 2005. The group consists of: * [[Howaldtswerke-Deutsche Werft]] in [[Kiel]], [[Germany]] * [[Blohm + Voss]] in [[Hamburg]], Germany (Blohm + Voss Shipyards, Blohm + Voss Repair GmbH und Blohm + Voss Industries 20%, Blohm + Voss Naval 50%) * [[Hellenic Shipyards Co.]] in [[Skaramangas]], [[Greece]] (25%) The group represents a sales volume of around €2.2 billion and has a workforce of 8,400 people as of August 30, 2006. The corporation opened up a branch office in [[Karachi]], [[Pakistan]] on 25 July 2007. By January 2009, it has become one of the biggest private shipbuilding companies in [[Pakistan]]. ==External links== *[http://www.tk-marinesystems.de Official website] {{ThyssenKrupp}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Thyssenkrupp Marine Systems}} [[Category:Shipbuilding companies of Germany]] [[Category:Defence companies of Germany]] [[Category:Manufacturing companies of Germany]] [[Category:Military vehicle manufacturers]] [[Category:Holding companies of Germany]] [[Category:Holding companies established in 2005]] [[Category:Manufacturing companies established in 2005]] [[Category:Privately held companies of Germany]]
